price: Sema: Hakika mimi nimeamrishwa nimuabudu Mwenyezi Mungu kwa kumsafishia Dini Yeye tu.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
footnotes: Sema: Mimi nimeamrishwa nimuabudu Mwenyezi Mungu kwa kumsafia ibada yangu isiwe na shirki ndani yake wala riya ya kujionyesha kwa watu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul innī umir'tu an aʿbuda al-laha mukh'liṣan lahu al-dīna
